snippet.title: Smash Bros Deluxe 2.0 Updates, Features & Release!
snippet.description:
2.0 release here: https://mega.nz/#!9qhFFaIJ!clARCcGlBHaEjkXBVuXaLmjm8Z1mN4_M2UrIaILYAxw

2.0 Unpacked release (for those that know what they're doing):
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1TDrnjN0xR8fQEoPldAe8goscgdARi5tG

Thanks to everyone whose work was utilized within this modpack.  Please enjoy and spread the word.  Enjoy a refresh of Smash for the Wii U as we wait the last few months for Smash Ultimate.  

The included readme should cover any questions you have, but if you have any more, comment here or look up elsewhere how to hack your Wii U and how to use things like SDCafiine and ftpiiU.

For the previous version and all the features included in that which were carried over here, watch the initial release video for Deluxe here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u6b0oJMlVtU

8-Bit Redial Remix used with permission from branflakes here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GZjBZwRPxJg

8-Bit remixes from Melee and Mario Odyssey used with permission from Bulby here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz6zvgkf6eKpgqlUZQstOtQ

Enjoy!!
